name: International Union of Economists and Managers in the EU
goal: The main target and goal of the Union is to provide and establish professional bridges and relations between the countries from the European Union and beyond. We are aiming for economical partnerships and relations focussing on social responsibilities through special programs, conferences, events, meetings and trainings.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
1. EU efforts and projects to re-establish/re-build structures and economies in zones/countries of war, terror, turmoils, epedemies and catastrophies.

2. EU principles to develop modern economies under ecological and social aspects.
